name: Figma
description: Figma is my design tool of choice. Features like Auto Layout v3 and Variants make it really fast to iterate and explore while designing interfaces.

name: Vercel
description: Everything I make on the internet lives on Vercel. Vercel is the gold standard of developer tools.

name: Next.js
description: The best way to build modern React websites.

name: Dependabot
description: Dependabot keeps all of my project dependencies up to date every week, saving me time and frustration.

name: Chakra UI
description: Chakra UI is a simple, modular and accessible component library for building UIs in react.

name: Chakra View
description: Collections of UI components, created with Chakra UI. It's like Tailwind UI but for Chakra ecosystem.

name: Heroicons
description: A gorgeous open source icon set – easily grab SVGs, or integrate it directly into your React project.

name: Hasura
description: Instant realtime GraphQL APIs for rapidly building apps without having to build, operate & scale a GraphQL server.

name: Docker
description: I use docker to avoid environment setup while deployment, just pull the container and it just works.

name: Github
description: I use github every single day to keep my work and to explore smart people of the world.

name: Laravel
description: You can build apps in weeks. Just get started with no time full of boilerplate nd best practices.

name: Spotify
description: As far as I can tell, the best music discovery and recommendation service available. I basically live in Spotify’s personal playlists.

name: Simplenote
description: This is one of best note taking apps with no frills. Access from any device Linux, Android, iOS, you name it.
